title: How should my approach be for the AEE examination? When can we expect AEE posts under TSPSC? - Quora

response.answer_text: For the first part of your question, go through the following link. Krishna Ajjampudi's answer to How should I plan for the AEE TSPSC civil preparation that is within months? For the second part, I suspect, if there is no increase in the retirement age, then you can expect a notification next year as there are going to be retirements in a big number across all engineering departments.
